name: B. Coins
statement:
One day Vasya came across three Berland coins. They didn’t have any
numbers that’s why Vasya didn’t understand how their denominations
differ. He supposed that if one coin is heavier than the other one, then
it should be worth more. Vasya weighed all the three pairs of coins on
pan balance scales and told you the results. Find out how the
deminations of the coins differ or if Vasya has a mistake in the
weighting results. No two coins are equal.
